model

Class DAOImplementationFich

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DAOImplementationFich
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO

    public class DAOImplementationFich
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO
    The DAOImplementationFich class is an implementation of the DAO (Data Access Object) interface for file-based operations. It provides methods for reading from and writing to files, specifically for handling ConvocatoriaExamen objects. 2dam

      • createConvocatoriaExamen

        public void createConvocatoriaExamen(ConvocatoriaExamen convocatoriaExamen)
                              throws ExceptionManager
        Creates a new ConvocatoriaExamen record by serializing the given ConvocatoriaExamen object and writing it to a file.

        If the file already exists, the new ConvocatoriaExamen object is appended to the existing data in the file. If the file does not exist, a new file is created for storing ConvocatoriaExamen objects.

        Specified by:
        createConvocatoriaExamen in interface DAO
        Parameters:
        convocatoriaExamen - The ConvocatoriaExamen object to be created and stored in the file.
        Throws:
        ExceptionManager - If an exception occurs during the file write operation.

      • updateIdUEnunciadoExamen

                                     ConvocatoriaExamen convocatoriaExamen)
        Updates the 'id_Enunciado' field of 'ConvocatoriaExamen' objects that match the given 'convocatoria' with the provided 'enunciado' object's ID.
        Specified by:
        updateIdUEnunciadoExamen in interface DAO
        Parameters:
        enunciado - The 'Enunciado' object containing the ID to update 'ConvocatoriaExamen' objects.
        convocatoriaExamen - The 'ConvocatoriaExamen' object to be updated based on 'convocatoria' matching.

      • ConsultUnidadDidactica

        public boolean ConsultUnidadDidactica(UnidadDidactica unidadDidactica)
                               throws ExceptionManager
        Description copied from interface: DAO
        Checks if a specific UnidadDidactica object exists in the data store. Returns true if found, or false if not found or if there are any errors during the process.
        Specified by:

      • ConsultConvocatoriaExamen

        public boolean ConsultConvocatoriaExamen(ConvocatoriaExamen convocatoriaExamen)
                                  throws ExceptionManager
        Checks if a specific ConvocatoriaExamen object exists in the file by its ID.

        This method reads ConvocatoriaExamen objects from the file and compares their IDs with the given ConvocatoriaExamen's ID to determine if it exists in the file.

        Specified by:
        ConsultConvocatoriaExamen in interface DAO
        Parameters:
        convocatoriaExamen - The ConvocatoriaExamen object to check for existence by ID.
        Returns:
        True if the ConvocatoriaExamen with the same ID exists in the file; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ExceptionManager - If an exception occurs during the file read operation.

      • ConsultConvocatoriasEnun

        public java.util.List<ConvocatoriaExamen> ConsultConvocatoriasEnun(Enunciado enunciado)
                                                            throws ExceptionManager
        Retrieves a list of ConvocatoriaExamen objects associated with a specific Enunciado from the file.

        This method reads ConvocatoriaExamen objects from the file and adds them to a list if they are associated with the given Enunciado based on their IDs.

        Specified by:
        ConsultConvocatoriasEnun in interface DAO
        Parameters:
        enunciado - The Enunciado object to specify the search criteria.
        Returns:
        A list of ConvocatoriaExamen objects associated with the specified Enunciado.
        Throws:
        ExceptionManager - If an exception occurs during the file read operation or if the file doesn't exist.
